thread.title: Taylor Swift is ‘the queen of mean’
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift is ‘the queen of mean’

title: Taylor Swift is ‘the queen of mean’
text:
Wendy Williams says Taylor Swift is ‘the queen of mean’ news.com.au Wendy Williams says Taylor Swift is ‘the queen of mean’ news.com.au Talk show host Wendy Williams is no fan of Taylor Swift. 
WENDY Williams has launched an attack on Taylor Swift, calling her “the queen of mean”. 
After initially praising the 25-year-old for becoming the most popular person on Instagram, the talk show host did an about-face and criticised the singer for being “mean”. 
“I think she’s probably meaner than Beyonce and Kim put together,” the host of The Wendy Williams Show said. 
“In my mind, Taylor Swift is the queen of the mean ... she’s sneaky and smart about doing it which makes her smarter than the other two.” 
“She’s got her girl army hypnotised to think that she’s the bees knees.” 
Williams also spoke about the fact that Swift had more followers than Beyonce and Kim Kardashian and was trying to fool people into thinking she was nice as pie by posting pictures of herself cooking with friends. Other Stories
